summary: Sid Caesar stars as the bumbling right hand man of mob boss Robert Ryan who is sent to find a corpse buried in a suit lined with stolen mob money.
cast: Sid Caesar|Robert Ryan|Anne Baxter|Kay Medford|Jan Murray|Richard Pryor|Arlene Golonka|Charles McGraw|Ben Blue|Dom DeLuise|Bill Dana|Godfrey Cambridge|Marty Ingels|George Jessel|Mickey Deems|Paul Wexler|Marina Koshetz|Norman Bartold|Mike Wagner|Larry Gelman|Don Brodie|Choo Choo Collins|Walt Davis|Audrie Magee|Sheila Bartold|Faith Christopher
title: Un millón en un cadáver
